data.title: Senior Product Designer
data.description: We are looking for a Senior Product Designer to join our team. You will be responsible for designing user-centric interfaces and experiences for our core products. You will work closely with product managers and engineers to deliver high-quality designs.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in product design
Proficiency in Figma and prototyping tools

data.title: Frontend Developer
data.description: We are seeking a skilled Frontend Developer to build and maintain our web applications. You will work with modern technologies like Vue.js and TypeScript to create responsive and performant user interfaces.
requirements: 3+ years of experience with Vue.js or React
Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

data.title: Marketing Manager
data.description: We are looking for a Marketing Manager to lead our marketing efforts. You will be responsible for developing and executing marketing strategies to drive growth and brand awareness.
requirements: Proven track record of successful campaigns
Excellent leadership and team management skills

data.title: Data Scientist
data.description: We are hiring a Data Scientist to analyze large datasets and extract actionable insights. You will build machine learning models and work with stakeholders to solve business problems.
requirements: Master's or PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field
Experience with Python and data science libraries (pandas, scikit-learn)
Experience with SQL and database management

data.title: HR Specialist
data.description: We are looking for an HR Specialist to support our HR department. You will assist with recruitment, onboarding, and employee relations.
requirements: Knowledge of labor laws and regulations
